name: Tomika
description:
TOMIKA is a hand-illustrated, 2D puzzle platformer game that takes you through the scary and ugly world seen through the eyes of a dog.  

The player encounters various environments where the gameplay depends fully on the decisions you make during your adventure.

 Based on a real life event, "Tomika: The Game" puts you into the role of Tomika - a dog left for dead, tied up in a bag - a monstreous act that should never happen but does much more often than you might think.
